title: Samsung Semiconductor India Research
content:
Education: B.Tech(Pune based college)
Years of Experience: 0(2024 passout)
Prior Experience:NA
Date of the Offer: January 2024
Company: Samsung Semiconductor
Title/Level: Senior Engineer
Location:Bangalore
Salary: 18,40,000(Base:17,29,000, PF+Gratuity:1,11,000)
Relocation Bonus: 35,000
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 1,11,000(every year)
Retention Bonus: 6,00,000(equally divided in 2 years)
Total 1st year Compensation: 22,85,000 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):25,85,000
Benefits:Regular Samsung Benefits
Other Details: OnCampus offer
